inn1.comm: good length, angling across the right-hander from move the wicket, Masakadza presses forward and defends towards point
good length pitching outside off, seam and bounce for Irfan, Masakadza protects his stumps and lets it go through to the keeper
a fuller ball outside off stump, Masakadza strides forward an drives fluently but to the fielder at mid-off
good length slanting across the right-hander, Masakadza watches it go past once again
closer to the batsman this time, on a good length, Masakadza comes forward and takes his bottom hand off the handle as the ball thuds into the bat
pitches around off and seams away from the right-hander, Masakadza strides forward and shoulders arms, Irfan begins with a maiden
that swung a long way from outside off stump, swung on to the middle of the bat it did. Chibhabha strode forward and drove the ball fluently through cover to score Zimbabwe's first runs
stays in his crease this time and defends as the ball nips into the right-hander from outside off stump
good length, coming back into the right-hander, a skiddy delivery from Yamin. Chibhabha stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
after several balls came into the right-hander, Yamin gets one to hold its line outside off after pitching on a good length, Chibhabha prods from his crease and is beaten
fuller and straighter, Chibhabha moves back and across and clips the ball off his pads through square leg
Chibhabha glances off the hips through square leg
good length at the body, pitching outside leg stump, the batsman defends towards a fielder stationed at a really short midwicket
goes back and across and nudges the ball through square leg
good length on leg and middle, Masakadza gets behind the line and blocks
short of a length with good bounce outside off, the batsman shoulders arms
lots of bounce from Irfan from just short of a length angling across the batsman, Masakadza lets it go again, but more awkwardly this time
defended on the front foot towards the off side
short of a length with width outside off, the ball holds its line though and beats the batsman's attempt at a cut off the back foot
Chibhabha tries to defend from the crease but gets hit on the pad by one that nips into him
punched off the front foot to mid on
a fullish ball, but Chibhabha stays back and punches the ball crisply with almost no back-lift, he could not pierce the infield at cover though
this time he does find the gap at cover with another fluent punch off the back foot, he had enough width outside off to play that shot
stays back in his crease and cuts the ball to the fielder at point. That early movement seems to be drying up quickly.
short of a length with width outside off, angling across the right-hander, Masakadza tries to slap through covers but mis-times it
short of a length but down leg side this time, Masakadza can't connect with his swing behind square
strides forward this time to a fuller ball and shoulders arms outside off stump, Masakadza has just played his 12th dot ball
moves forward and across to a fuller ball that is on leg and middle and forces it towards midwicket with bat close to front pad, he seemed cramped for room as he played that
that's a tight leave, very close to off stump. Irfan pitched on a good length around off and took the ball away from the right-hander with the angle from over the wicket
he gets off the mark by thumping a full ball down the ground with a fierce drive, that ball was too full outside off and Masakadza cashed in on the freedom to swing his arms
stays back this time and steers the ball to third man
strays down leg side, that's a wide, the keeper did well to dive to his left and collect
nudged into the leg side for a quick single, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but the batsman is safe
good length on off and middle, Chibhabha chooses to stay back and push towards midwicket. Don't think he would stay back to that length if Yamin was quicker
steps out of his crease this time and slaps a length ball from wide outside off stump through cover, that was hit really hard
defended from the crease towards the bowler
stays back to another length ball closer to off stump and drives to cover, he can't find the gap
wide outside off stump, Chibhabha stays back and cuts hard but mis-times the ball to point, that was a loose delivery and he should have put it away
nudged off the pads on the leg side
Chibhabha stays in his crease and pushes forward tentatively to a good length ball that pitches around off and seams away, he is beaten, needs to be more decisively forward
short of a length and Chibhabha goes back and pulls the ball in front of square leg, not timed well
moves back and across his stumps and flicks a ball off the pads behind square leg
waits on the back foot for a length ball that slants across him and punches the ball towards cover
that is too full to stay in the crease and drive, Chibhabha tries to do it but is beaten very close to off stump
a full ball on middle and off, Masakadza moves forward and across to get behind the line and blocks
short of a length with some extra bounce outside off sump, left alone by the batsman
good length and straight, Masakadza gets behind the line and plays the ball back to the bowler

caught on the pull at long leg! Wahab dug it in short but the ball did not rise much, Masakadza stayed in his crease and swung across the line but he did not make great contact. Ifran settles under the catch several yards inside the boundary
stays back and across and defends on the leg side
punched into the covers for a really quick single, the throw misses at the bowler's end
over-steps with his first ball from the new end, driven to cover by the batsman, who will have a free hit coming up
misses the blockhole length and bowls a low full toss outside off stump, Chibhabha stays in his crease, well balanced, and drives the ball crisply to the cover boundary
and again, stays in his crease and drives a length ball through the gap between cover and point, superb timing
a fuller and straighter ball, Chibhabha presses forward and plays the ball towards mid-off
tries to drive straight this time but gets an outside edge towards third man
defended from the crease towards the off side, that was Chari's first ball
banged in short, but too short and the ball sails over the batsman's head, an easy one to leave
played from the crease towards cover point, a rather long over ends
pushed off the front foot towards cover
tries to punch off the back foot but doesn't time it well to mid off
stays back in his crease and defends on the leg side, Wahab is keeping it tight, bowling straight
good length and just outside of, dabbed off the back foot to Yasir at point and they run a quick single
good length and straight, defended on the back foot
a fuller ball outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
strides out of his crease and defends because he isn't to the pitch of the ball
defended on the front foot into the covers
bowled flat and straight, the batsman stays back and swats it towards the bowler
a huge appeal for lbw but the umpire thinks it is too high, that was the quicker and straighter one from Yasir and it hurried on to Chibhabha, striking him above the knee roll
defended on the leg side
drags the last ball short and Chibhabha puts it away, rocking deep into his crease and pulling to deep square leg
a full ball outside off sump, left alone by the batsman
good length around off stump, defended from the crease on the off side
good length on middle and off, the batsman gets behind the line and defends with a straight bat
a full ball on off stump, Chari pushes off the front foot to cover but can't get off the mark
good length, pitching just outside off and slanting away, left alone by the batsman
wider outside off stump, but Chari does not try and use the width, lets it go
pitches the leg break on a great length on off stump, drawing the batsman forward, and then rips the legbreak past the outside edge of the forward defence
defended on the front foot, bat close to front pad
a full ball outside off, driven on the front foot to long off
a lovely shot to get off the mark, stays back and moves across to one that does not turn too much and punches through point
pushed towards point for a single
a full ball outside off, driven to cover
gets on top of the bounce of a length ball and punches the ball crisply off the back foot, placing it behind point to bring up Zimbabwe's fifty
defended from the crease on the leg side
stays in his crease and jams his bat down to defend a delivery that skids on to him from short of a length quite quickly
pushed from the crease towards point, Wahab is offering very little freedom to the batsman with his straight line
short of a length on leg and middle, Chari stays back and defends on the leg side
good length but on the pads, nudged behind square for a single
strides forward to push the legbreak towards point
strides out again and pushes the ball with soft hands to cover for a quick single
stays back and is cramped for room by a ball that skids on with the arm, defended on the off side
that one is a wide down leg side
flatter and shorter outside off, Chibhabha stays back, makes a bit of room and hits the ball through cover point
cuts off the back foot but he does not beat the fielder at backward point
gets a long stride forward and defends towards the bowler
gets on to the front foot and nudges off the pads towards square leg
pitches short and spins the ball on to the pads, turns the ball behind square off the back foot
slips down leg side, that's a wide
worked off the pads to short fine leg
tossed up outside off stump, defended on the front foot
a full ball on middle and leg, flicked to square leg
goes deep into the crease and works the ball behind square
Chibhabha goes back and across to try and defend a legbreak, he did not read that and was beaten outside off stump
defended on the front foot towards point
gets low outside off stump and paddles a full toss towards fine leg
he tries to do the paddle again but this time the full toss dips a little and takes the bottom edge on to his pad
flat and wide outside off, goes back and cuts but does not find the gap
driven on the front foot to cover
tossed up high and full, angled in too, whipped in front of square
beaten as he leans forward and tries to drive through the on side, the full delivery hits the pad and dribbles to the off side
pulls back the length a bit, flattish trajectory, he waits on it and dabs it to short third
takes a big stride forward and lap sweeps it on the full fine down the leg side
runs fine down the leg side again to end the over
almost gets in trouble against a half tracker, spoons it up in the air, but it falls short of extra cover
an outside edge now as he draws him forward with some flight, but Azhar has not given himself a slip, and this runs into the third man boundary despite a slide from Shafiq
short again from Azhar, and it is slapped off the back foot out to the sweeper
more width, and this time he goes squarer with a sharp cut, Bilal at sweeper does well to cut it off with a clumsy dive
short again, and the sweeper is in business once more
tossed up too full on middle and forced down to long on
tossed up high, comes in full, and is eased to long on
full on middle and off, pushed past midwicket
around good length, some turn in towards off, he pushes forward, inside edges square on the leg side
goes on the back foot and against the turn as he spots a shorter length, pushes it behind point
bat well in front of pad to defend safely to the off side
overpitched around middle, worked past midwicket
tries to cut but the length is not really short, and he is beaten as it spins away
moves forward and pushes a full one softly to covers
quicker one, not much turn, outside off, pushed away to covers
fuller length on the stumps, hit down to long on
wrong 'un comes in, he is moving forward and closes the face to jab it square to leg
short and wide, he cranks up and bashes it, but sweeper is around to stop it
bends just outside off for the lap sweep, takes the full delivery and gets it past the keeper
comes down the track, almost yorks himself as the flighted ball dips on him, cannot get it further than wide mid on
moves to his half century as he calmly pushes it with the slight turn to long on, and to cheers from the sparse crowd
could have been tight had backward square leg been able to pick up the ball as he ran in
worked off the pad to Rizwan at backward square
goes back to a quick one turning in and punches it to the bowler
full outside off, pushed past cover off the front foot
comes forward to defend one on a tighter line
quite wide, but Zimbabwe miss out once more as it is slapped straight to backward point
reaches out and lofts with the spin over extra cover, sweeper has done well to keep it in with a sprawling dive, long off is nearby and throws the ball back in
tossed up, full, just outside off, whipped through midwicket
on the back foot and opens up to work it between midwicket and mid on
fullish line coming in from off, turned to square leg
skips out and tries to go through the leg side, but is not to the pitch and takes it on the pad
playing a pitched up ball off the back foot, nearly gets into trouble as it spins in and bounces, he drops it softly on to the crease
sweeps hard and nicely, with the spin, cleanly in the air over square leg
comes in and rolls away square off the pad
fullish, around off, he leans forward and pushes it to sweeper cover to bring up the 100

dropped by the bowler, loose drive in the air, around shoulder height to Azhar's left, pops out of his hands, had extra cover's dive been successful in stopping the ball, there could have been a run out
full one whipped down to long on
shortish, quick, he rocks back and forces it to long on
wrong 'un, floated up wide outside off and coming in, he thrusts pad out and lets it go
tight line just outside off, slight turn, patted away
leg stump line, nudged to backward square
some flight this time, middle and leg line, worked to midwicket
tossed up full and angled across the right hander who pushes to extra cover
firm push to a pitched up ball but Malik is swift to his right to stop it
length ball on middle, turned to deep midwicket past a dive from the man in the ring
taps a short of a length ball towards cover and they go through for a quick single
shortish, he swivels and pulls it away with control to deep midwicket
beats him right away with the changed angle, as he feels for a short of a length ball outside off
better from Chari this time as he takes a step outside off and raises bat to let a lifter pass
that took off from back of a length as Irfan banged it in, Chari goes down hurriedly under it
comes in just a bit, starts well outside off, and is left alone
angled across to middle and off, clipped straight to midwicket
is not to the pitch as he walks out to one on leg, but manages to whip it past midwicket
shortens the length as batsman comes out, has to be content with a tap to midwicket
well done, mid off is up, he skips out, gets under the pitch and lofts it nicely high over the ring, couple of bounces and it goes over the rope
leans forward to push one on middle to the bowler, that was in the air for a bit
turn there, but shortish length, and he cuts it to the sweeper
was trying to go leg side off one on the pad but ends up pushing it past the bowler, mid on races in but Irfan is in the way as he looks to go at the other end, throws it to the bowler instead
drives a pitched up ball without much foot movement, finds extra cover
taps a short of a length ball to backward point
softly works a shortish ball to the right of midwicket
Irfan does what he was brought back for - breaks the partnership. Fuller length from round the stumps does it, tight line around off makes Chari play and lone slip tumbles to take the outside edge
too full just outside off, calmly patted back to the bowler
tossed up full just outside off, forced to wide long on
angled in to the left hander who stretches forward to push it to Malik
gets off the mark with a big one, slog-sweeps a fullish ball cleanly in the air, there is no one at deep midwicket
down the track now to ease it to long off
Malik dives to his right but cannot prevent the single as the ball rolls away from him
that spun and bounced, he was looking to work it square with the inward angle, but it kicked and took the shoulder of the bat, in the region of point
short of a good length, on middle, turned to deep midwicket
leans forward and pushes neatly to covers, there is a direct hit at the striker's end from the man backing up for the original throw, and they take one for the ricochet
dabbed to third man for a single

Williams survives, Riaz surprises him with a sharp lifter that straightens, Williams is in a very awkwrd position, trying to evade as well as trying to play, and an outside edge flies over the lone slip
the pace and bounce of Riaz works for Pakistan, Williams looks to punch this rising back of a length delivery, he does not have the room, and slip takes the catch
calmly lets a pacy length ball pass across him outside off
tapped off the front foot to the leg side
straightening on middle, worked to deep square leg
down the track to softly play it out to off
nudged in the air, but well clear of the man at leg slip, deep square leg runs in to field
big shout for catch at leg slip, Yasir is in that position, he was attempting a sweep, has brushed the thigh pad definitely, cannot say if there was some bat before that
goes for the sweep to a fuller and quicker one, to deep backward square
back of a length ball, no room, he pushes it with a thick inside edge to the leg side
playing a length ball from the crease and has to jab it towards point
thick outside edge as he is caught on the crease again to a wider one, the ball runs away to third man
not really short but Chibhabha swings hard and gets it through midwicket before it is stopped in the deep
this is short and gets big on him, he sways a bit inside the line and controls the pull to deep midwicket
goes full for the stumps, he gathers himself to block it back
leaves the crease, gets too close to the pitch and eases it to long off
Chigumbura down the track too, picks up one to long on
slows it down, he stays back and works it square, they think about a second but settle for one
shortish, he makes some room, but extra cover stops it with a dive to his left
shortish agian, pulled to deep backward square leg
tossed up on leg stump, he sweeps to long leg
flat legbreak punched to a diving extra cover
tries to flay a fuller one through the off side, misses
slows down this one, he has to wait on the back foot to drag it down to long off
short outside off, cut in the gap to sweeper's right
tossed up pretty full, driven to long off
short again from Yasir this over and he pays for it as it is pulled over midwicket, into the gap
leaves the crease but knocks it straight back to the bowler
worked in front of square off the pads
stays low as it spins down the pads, is nudged square
punched hard off the back foot but Malik stops it to his left
tosses it up on leg stump, he comes down the track and turns it past midwicket
full just outside leg stump, pushed with a straight bat to long on
lovely delivery, pitching middle, drawing him forward and spinning past the edge, and just past off stump
takes a couple of steps out and goes hard past extra cover with the turn
pretty full outside off, hit to the right of the sweeper
quick one, shortish, punched to point, who has a go at the non-striker's end, and concedes an extra run
pushes a flighted ball to the sweeper
leaving the crease once more and forcing it down to long on
takes it from outside leg stump and sweeps in the air, but wide of the man at short fine leg
nudged in front of square off the pad for a single
shortish ball, he helps it behind square, there is a man in the deep there
comes forward to push it to the off side close to the pitch
makes some room and punches this shortish ball hard off the back foot, in the gap past point for four
worked off the pad to deep midwicket
around the blockhole outside off stump, squeezed past extra cover for one
width on this length ball and he flays it to the sweeper, who fumbles, and they take the second too
finds the blockhole from round the stumps, no option but to jam it away
widish delivery, did not seem to come on and he ends up spooning it in the air, over covers

full outside off, driven to sweeper cover, Chigumbura wants the second, it is not there, he turns back and dives, Irfan stretches his massive hands in front of the stumps, grabs the ball and takes the bails off, but Chigumbura's dive is enough
widish one, again slowing down appreciably after pitching, and batsman misses
full delivery driven to wide long on
pops up on to the pitch as he fails to work this full one away, appeal for leg before, but it was heading down
they push for two and get it comfortably after it is worked through square leg
full and dribbles to short fine leg, Chibhabha wants the single but Chigumbura is not interested
shout for leg before from the bowler, decent one as this pitches leg and straightens, the ball rolls towards short fine
flashes at a widish full toss and it flies to the third man rope
pushes a pitched up ball to extra cover, non-striker wants a single, there isn't any here
slowish length ball dabbed to third man, who runs in but cannot prevent the second run
bouncer, around the line of off, he sways inside the line
was trying to get out of the way of a short of a length ball, then saw it was not rising much and tried to play it, but missed
wide and slow, he glides it to third man for a single
walks out and turns it off the pad to square leg
skips out and has a go, finds midwicket
too close to the pitch as he jumps out and cannot get it away again
goes straight across him with the angle, he can only tap it away
manages to get it past midwicket this time
low full toss hit to long on
shortish ball, does not give him too much room, and he is beaten as he tries to run it past the keeper
attacks a widish length ball, thick edge races down to third man
Chibhabha goes on 90, Wahab again with the breakthrough, a full delivery outside off, Chibhabha drives without moving his feet, and keeper dives to his right to take a sharp catch
and another outside edge as Raza goes after a widish length ball, just out of the reach of slip
guides a short of a length ball past cover for a single

Wahab is celebrating, he has surprised Chigumbura with a really quick bouncer, Chigumbura has tried a weak hook, the ball has looped to midwicket, but there is nothing from the umpire, Chigumbura is checking his helmet, replays show that has come right off the logo on the front of the helmet and travelled that far, tells you something about the pace on that one
worked to short fine leg
down the track to hit it to long off
tucks him up with a full one on middle, Chigumbura defends
fullish one turned off the pad to backward square
shortish on leg stump, Raza opens up and hammers it in front of square, Yasir is not sharp enough in the deep and the second is on
Raza down the track, under the pitch and lofts it hard down the ground, to the left of wide long on
stays on the crease, clears front leg and slices it over covers
top edge goes soaring high and comes down near the boundary at fine leg, and rolls into the rope, Raza was hurried by this back of a length ball as he tried to pull
no room with this short of a length ball but Raza is able to turn it to third man

having taken one flush on the helmet from Wahab, Chigumbura responds with a powerful blow, gets leg side, takes a step or two out and mows this shortish delivery way over deep midwicket, that has landed on the roof of the stadium
hangs back to a slower one now and guides it wide of third man
yorker, leg stump, Chigumbura is moving around, jams the bat down, the ball travels past short fine, deep square leg runs around, boundary prevented
full outside off, eased to the sweeper
has a go at a slow, wide length ball and is beaten as it moves away from the right hander
full toss around off, hit straight to sweeper cover
another full toss, Chigumbura runs it to third man to reach another ODI fifty
gets the yorker in, Raza squeezes it with an open face to third man
lovely shot, Irfan too full outside off, Chigumbura drives without too much power, the timing is excellent and he has hit the gap between sweeper and long off
goes for the yorker around middle and leg, just misses it, batsman flays it past the bowler to long on
high full toss, Chigumbura moves across and swings it in front of square, all the way over the rope, that was close to being a no-ball for height
full and wide now from round the stumps, hit to sweeper cover
cracks a length ball straight to extra cover, did not get the timing there
full and wide, too far outside off
slower one cuts in from outside off, is heaved to long off
walks across to a full toss, eyeing the leg side, ends up hitting it straight up, it falls in vacant mid on region
drags a short of a length ball to midwicket, but fielder fails to pick up the ball cleanly, would have been a run out chance if he had
makes some room and goes in the air, on the bounce to wide long off
slower length ball, Raza swings hard, only chops it into the off side
this time he gets the placement right, makes more room and carves the length ball between extra cover and long off, 250 up
swings and misses this shortish slower one and staggers to the leg side, but recovers quickly enough to take a single
taps a length ball to point for a single
walks across to off stump and whips this full one to long on
darts in a slowish short ball, Chigumbura swings and misses, takes it on the body
Chigumbura has shattered his own stumps, he was hanging back in the crease, so deep that as he tried to reach this wide full toss, he disturbed his wicket as his bat came down
what a start for Mutumbami, gets an overpitched ball outside off and drives it past extra cover, out of the reach of long off
a slower ball, Mutumbami goes down on a knee and slogs it over the non-striker, four more
goes wide of the crease and gets the yorker dead accurate, Mutumbami jams it down the ground, and they manage to scramble for a second run
starts with a short and wide one, Raza charges out and hammers it to extra cover, there is a needless throw, and another run is taken
short and slow, Raza down the track to heave it through midwicket for two more
Raza goes this time trying to engineer a boundary fine down the leg side, walks outside off and swings at this short ball, only gloves it behind
slow, short, wide, dismissed to the deep extra cover boundary, too easy
goes full outside off, and Jongwe misses, keeper cannot stop it  cleanly
ends the innings with a boundary, it is a bouncer, and the attempted hook has been top-edged right over the keeper, useful placement for Zimbabwe

inn2.comm: loopy ball to begin, on Azhar's pads who can only find square leg with his flick
this one is wider outside off, just a hint of away movement. Azhar guides the ball to third man with not much feet movement
nice lines, fullish and just outside off, Bilal offers the full face of the bat as he defends
very wide outside off and called. There is some away movement for Panyangara though
drags his line back immediately, nice comeback. Full on off which is defended to mid-off

and that is the first one! Bilal Asif goes. Very poor shot from him though. The debutant sees the fuller length outside off and goes for the heave down the ground. He can only lob the ball up to mid-off. The bat may have turned in his hands but the ball spoons straight up and Zimbabwe have their first.
that's a poor ball. Too full on leg and Hafeez neatly clips the ball to the square leg boundary off the front foot. No problem at all.
nice start. Back of a length and outside off, Azhar shuffles down the track with lots of intent and chooses to leave
just a hint of movement. Good length and outside off again. Azhar's movement is a lot more convincing but shoulders arms again
much fuller this time, Azhar drives back to the bowler off the front foot
fuller than a good length outside off, Azhar wants nothing to do with that as he decides to leave again
that's a poor delivery. Too full and too wide, Azhar lets it be and a wide is called
comes back in just a tad towards off, Azhar almost plays all around that but improvises well and plays the ball towards mid-off
another good delivery to end, fuller and moving away from off stump, Azhar pokes at the ball and squirts the ball to point
ooh, almost goes through Hafeez's defense, fuller length on middle and leg, Hafeez gets bat down in time and inside-edges to fine leg
good stuff here, very tight on off. Azhar pushes the ball to point
good length outside off, harmlessly patted to point with minimal feet movement

cleans him up. Another one goes. Azhar Ali goes. This one comes back in a touch, may have been the offcutter and Azhar prods at the ball as it takes the inside-edge and then rattles the stumps. Huge wicket. And a great start for Zimbabwe. Pakistan under massive pressure now.
solid block. Full outside off and Shafiq gets a giant front foot stride to defend
great over. Very tight stuff, fuller length on off and middle which is met with another solid defense off the front foot
loose stuff from Hafeez. Fuller outside off and moving away, inviting a drive and Hafeez throws his hands at the ball and connects well with his drive to cover
better cricket. tighter line towards off and Hafeez gets a good stride down and leaves
just a bit wider, Jongwe is getting consistent away swing to Hafeez here who leaves again
brings his line closer to off stump. Fullish and shaping away from off, Hafeez drives to mid-off
that is a shot, great timing and of great quality. Fullish again and moving away, Hafeez gets a good stride again, meets the ball late as he leans on the dive to find the gap through extra cover
drags his length back now. Good length on off, turned away to midwicket
good length on off, Asad pushes the ball to mid-on with soft hands and calls for a single immediately
fuller again, moving in to off, Hafeez presents the full face of the bat to defend
back of a length and wide outside off - sixth-stump line. Hafeez lets the ball go
nice delivery again, full and moving away from off, Hafeez tries to defend but the ball squeezes out to point off the outer half
pushed wider outside off as he sees Hafeez advancing, Hafeez doesn't get the line he wants and leaves

another boundary. Great timing. Just one bad delivery in that over and Hafeez punishes him. Too full on leg and Hafeez will not miss out on these. Whips the ball through the vacant midwicket region for four
good length and the ball is still swinging for Jongwe. Shafiq defends the away swing to point
brings the ball closer to off this time, in fact goes towards middle and leg, pushed to midwicket

another one goes, poor delivery by Jongwe, but he won't care. Asad cannot execute the drive, the ball bounces a touch, takes the edge and the keeper accepts the opportunity with ease. Wide and swinging away from the right-hander and much too full but Shafiq wants to plays the exotic square drive, but he can only feather one through
nice start. Fullish and aiming towards off, solidly blocked out to mid-off
strays on Mailk's pads this time who cannot execute the flick. He is struck on the pads but the ball is moving well past leg
good end. Back of a length and shaping away, defended off the back foot
good length on a fourth-stump line. Hafeez gets behind the line and defends into the off side, he is looking for a single but is sent back
fuller this time outside off, inside-edged towards midwicket

ooh, this one bounces short of the keeper. Hafeez misreads the length and plays off the back foot to a fullish length and gets a thick under-edge. The ball squirts through and past the keeper as he tries to field
wider outside off, left alone by Hafeez
much fuller and straighter, just outside off. Blocked back to the bowler with a good stride
a touch too full but the advancing Hafeez can only drive straight to mid-off.
nice stroke. Full and outside off, Malik times his drive nicely but can only find short cover
speared in the blockhole this time, dug out to point by Malik
too full and too wide, missed opportunity by Malik. He looks to drive but squeezes the ball back down the pitch
nice lines these from Jongwe. Good length on a fifth-stump line, Malik can only hang back and defend off the back foot
similar lines and lengths. Malik gets a giant foot forward and blocks the full length
he comes down the track this time to throw the lengths off but the ball comes back in, very similar to Azhar's dismissal. This one takes a thick inside edge towards fine leg
dug in very short outside off, Malik gets under it with plenty of time to spare as the ball loops past him
good length and moving away just a tad. Malik pushes the ball to extra cover with no feet movement
nice stuff, comes back in this time towards off and middle but Malik is good enough to get behind the line and defend back to the bowler
this one shapes away, this movement is not extravagant, just a little bit but enough to keep the batsmen quiet. Defended to mid-on
quite wide outside off and Malik shoulders arms

what a shot. Real quality on offer. Waiting for the loose balls to come and dispatching em. Too full this time on off, no movement and Malik drives it straight past the bowler. Great-looking straight drive
even better shot, this time from Hafeez. Too full and swinging in, Hafeez plays the ball late and delectably whips the ball through midwicket. No stopping that.
missed opportunity now. Too short and wide, Hafeez badly times the ball to short cover
thick outside edge all along the ground to third man. Angled in from wider off the crease and squeezed out by Hafeez
good delivery. Good length outside off, Malik pushes the ball to cover off the front foot
again, a hint of away movement. But not enough. Malik comes forward and pats the ball to point off the front foot
another short and wide delivery which is hit to the fielder. Malik looked to hit that one too hard and failed to find the gap, smashed that straight to extra cover
lots of spin and beats the outside edge of the prodding Hafeez. Lands it perfectly, on a  fuller length outside off, rips past his edge
shuffles down the track and drives to cover
spins a lot again. Shorter and a tad wider, the turn and bounce takes the ball past Hafeez's edge
drifts on with the arm towards off, cut to point
this one doesn't turn much either. Pushed into the off side harmlessly
good use of the feet now. Gets to the pitch of the ball and drives with the spin to long-off
nice start, wide outside off, pushed into the off side
closer to off now. Hafeez drives the fullish length to point
too straight and too full but Hafeez cannot find any gap, but he can find midwicket with his flick
nice pressure from the fielders here. Fuller length coming in to Hafeez who nudges towards square leg. The fielder is quick on it and prevents the single
Chamu strays in line this time, Hafeez tucked off his pads to fine leg
whipped off middle stump to deep square leg
tossed up wide outside off, defended to cover
lands it too short and wide, smashed off the back foot to the sweeper cover
drifts on with the arm, fuller and aiming for off stump but blocked by Hafeez
again, short and wide and cut to the sweeper off the back foot
the third poor ball of the over, another short and wide delivery and Malik drives to deep cover
follows-up with a flighted delivery on off which ends up being overpitched. Easily driven with the spin to long-off
full on off, Hafeez can only defend back to the bowler
drags his length back, good length on off and middle, Hafeez turns the ball to midwicket with his wrists
well played, tight lines again on off. Hafeez opens the face of the bat and guides the ball to third man
too short now on off, Malik gets high on his toes and tickles the ball off his hips to the fine leg region
too straight but Hafeez finds midwicket with his flick once more

and the pressure has told in the form of a wicket. Fantastic fielding by the substitute. Hafeez flicks again wide of that midwicket fielder and sets off for a run. But the sub dives full-length to his right and makes an amazing stop. Returns a good throw to the keeper and Hafeez is stranded mid-pitch after Malik sends him back. The wicket goes to the fielder there, not much could be done in terms of communication there.
flighted outside off, blocked off the front foot
comes back in with the arm, Malik stays back and defends into the off side
pressure-release delivery. Short and wide, cut away past point for a comfortable brace
beautifully tossed up outside off, Malik can only block
slightly quicker through the air, lands it nicely on a full length outside off, pushed out to cover
this one drifts on with the arm, tickled away straight to midwicket

oooh, almost goes through his defense first up. Full and coming back in, Sarfraz drives with no feet movement, leaving a massive gap between bat and pad. But the inside edge misses the stumps and goes to fine leg
good batting by Malik, lets the length delivery come to him before steering it to third man
fullish length on off, squirted out to midwicket
no gap again. Good length on middle, turned away to midwicket
overpitched outside off, but the wickets has caused Sarfraz to meet the ball with a solid forward defense
nicely played, just too much width outside off, Sarfraz dabs the ball off the back foot to third man
poor delivery. Short and wide, cut away to point
too short again outside off, this time SA finds the gap through cover for a single with his cut
overpitched on middle, nurdled away towards square leg against the turn
slowed up nicely, Sarfraz wants to sweep and gets down very early, the ball is wide outside off and beats his premeditated sweep
fullish length on off, blocked off the front foot
too full on off, drilled down to long-off with the turn
opens the face and guides this length ball but there is a widish slip in and he dives to stop it
overpitched outside off, squeezed to backward point who gets some bad bounce and lets it slip through, cover gives chase, in vain
calmly guides another length ball to third man
takes it from around off and whips it through square leg

Pakistan falling apart at the moment, Sarfraz has popped one straight to extra cover, this length delivery seemed to stop on him as he looked to punch it, hit the bat near the toe end and looped up for a simple catch
nicely forward to push a length delivery to a diving backward point
slanted in fullish, eased back to the bowler
darted in to the pad, worked to deep backward square leg
lunges for a sweep, drags it from around off to deep backward square
worked off the back foot behind square
tossed up slowly outside off, pushed to covers
hurried on as he came forward to defend, took a thick edge and went past slip
drives, not right off the middle of the bat, but firmly in the gap between mid on and midwicket
whips it from well outside off, straight to midwicket
overpitched on the stumps, and Malik puts it away nicely, drilling it straight past the non-striker
comes forward and taps a length ball to the off side
waits in the crease and whips it from outside off through square leg
nippy delivery pitched up on off, he pushes it to extra cover
right on middle, he leans forward, bat in front of pad, to block
slanted in down the pads, worked to deep backward square
just wide of a diving mid off, Rizwan had charged out, moved to the leg side and swung hard
pushed off the front foot to extra cover
coming in with the angle, knocked down to long on for one
goes back in the crease to keep this length ball out
widish legbreak with quite some turn, slapped away to sweeper cover

leggie strikes immediately, but this is down to a superb take from Nyumbu at slip, Rizwan wanted to steer it with the turn past Nyumbu, but the fielder, anticipating the stroke, moved a bit to his right and followed the path of the ball to snap it up, tumbling down as he took it
pushed to midwicket for a quick single
pushed off the front foot to point
goes on the back foot to guide it past point
they think about a single but mid on is on to this push quickly
drives a tossed up full one to extra cover
goes back to turn a shortish one past the square-leg umpire
that hurried in with the angle, struck him on the pad, and raced past slip, more of a polite look at the umpire than an appeal from Williams, that looked plumb, unless there was a thin inside edge
pushed off the front foot
played out towards extra cover
wants to cut but it comes in quickly and he is cramped for room
this one spins away sharply from around middle and leg, and he taps it off the back foot
down the track this time and lofts it over the bowler, who has done himself some damage while trying to stop that
slants it in and drags it down the leg side, even as batsman misses an awkward sweep
turn this time from outside off, worked to midwicket
plays from the crease and chops a bouncing offbreak towards slip
cuts in from outside off, is dabbed to third man
short of a length ball played out towards extra cover
widish ball pushed away, cover dives to half-stop it, point completes formalities
good length, coming in a tad, defended off the back foot
walks out, stops, lets it come on, and taps it to point
pushed away straight to cover
turns in big time, is jabbed square on the leg side from the crease
punched off the back foot against the turn to cover
moves across to work it with the spin behind square leg
tossed up just outside off, he bends forward and plays it square
Yamin attacks against the pressure, charges out and lofts with the spin, from just outside off, long on thinks he is in business as he runs to his right, but it just clears the rope
worked behind square leg
drives, without much timing, to extra cover
counterattack from Yamin, leaves the crease, gets under this length ball and goes dead straight in the air, lovely followthrough
lets this length ball come on outside off and runs it to point
thick outside edge, but he has played with soft hands, and it falls well short of lone slip
moves across, gets behind the line of this rising length ball and blocks
dropped by Nyumbu at slip, Yamin went hard at the drive on this full and wide one, Nyumbu dived to his right as the ball flew off the edge but could not hold on one-handed
tossed up length ball tapped to midwicket
whipped to backward square leg, he sends back the non-striker
not much turn but bounce, he pushes it wide of point
turned off the pad to backward square leg
opens up in the crease but is cramped for room by this length ball around off
pushed to midwicket off the front foot
jabs a length ball wide of point for one
thick edge to backward point along the ground off this length ball
Yamin keeps going down the ground, this one had mid off interested but was hit well enough to clear him comfortably
turned to midwicket, Yamin rushes for the single, Raza throws at the correct end, but Yamin has made it back in time
moves in a bit from a length, is worked to deep backward square
pushes a short of a length ball to midwicket
stumping chance missed, Yamin charged out but this was tossed up well down the leg side, keeper could not collect the ball though
worked with the spin in front of square
late decision to have a dab at this one slanted wide outside off, and he is beaten
is on the back foot but is also cramped for room with some sharp turn on this length ball
is wiser this time and calmly plays it out on the off side from the crease
wants to sweep this fine down the leg side but misses
turning in to middle and leg, worked behind square
comes down the track and collects a single with a push to long on
opens the face and runs it to third man even as no-ball is called, tight call on the front foot this
drags it short, angles it down the leg side, Yamin swings and misses
Yamin sends the free hit soaring over the leg side, Raza sets himself up at the edge of the deep midwicket boundary, and lets it slip through his fingers over the rope
punches a length ball to long on
thick outside edge on the drive, backward point stops it with a dive to his left
walks down the track, he shortens the length considerably,and Malik can only tap it to midwicket
dropped at backward point, Malik cuts it straight to Mutombodzi, and it pops out of his hands, Zimbabwe slackening in the field last few overs
pitched up ball driven to the sweeper
defended off the front foot to the bowler
fullish ball just outside off, turned to midwicket
difficult chance missed, shortish ball pulled behind square, Panyangara rushes in from the boundary, and dives forward, but cannot pull off what would have been a spectacular take
moves across and softly works it in front of square leg for one
rocks back and cuts hard, but picks out cover
good length to begin after drinks, dabbed away to third man
Malik shuffles across and works the ball with soft hands towards the deep square leg region, sufficient enough to get two
slower delivery on off, Malik backs away and powers a ball to cover with inadequate timing
nice stroke. Picked his gap well. Too full outside off, and Malik launches this over mid-off. Picked the ball and executed well
fullish length outside off, turned away to midwicket with the wrists

brilliant shot. And amazing execution. Fifty for Shoaib with that. Too full again outside off, this time Malik moves across, gets to the pitch and swipes the ball way over the midwicket boundary. Massive hit
tossed up on off, nurdled away to midwicket
and there is another boundary. Overpitched outside off, Yamin goes inside out and hits the ball over the infield for four.
tossed up on off and Yamin is happy to defend
shorter and flatter on leg, Yamin can only pull to short fine leg
quicker through the air on off, Yamin meets the ball with a solid defense
flatter again, and quick through the air. Yamin is beaten by the variation as he steps down and misjudges the length. He improvises well however to pat the ball into the off side
pushed through flat outside off, Malik gets a good stride forward to block
well run there. Flatter again on off, Malik opens the face and pushes to cover with soft hands and immediately sets off for one. gets a good response from his partner
fired in on off, defended off the back foot
drifts on with the arm towards off stump, Yamin hangs back and keeps the ball out
flighted outside off, Yamin gets on the front foot and pushes the ball to long-off
a bit too short and wide and Malik cuts nicely in front of point. The sweeper is quick on it to keep it down to one
worked away off the pads to square leg for one
Yamin advances and skews the flighted delivery to long-on
poor ball, short on leg, rank long-hop and Malik swivel-pulls to deep backward square leg
two more. flight on off, Yamin skips down the track and mis-hits the heave into the gap between deep midwicket and square leg
flatter now on off, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
that's gone all the way! What is happening here? Yamin skips down the track and launches a huge hit over the long-on boundary to get to is fifty. What a stroke. Great timing. Well played Yamin.

wrong shot selection by Malik. Or was it? Flatter outside off, Malik goes back and tries to work the ball into the leg side from the tramline on the off side. He misses as the ball spins, and so does the keeper
short and wide, creamed away to the sweeper cover with a cut
nicely bowled, slowed up through the air on off, Yamin outside-halves the ball to point
flat and quick on middle, defended to the leg side

poor delivery this and Williams is frustrated. Rank long-hop on leg stump, Yamin gets down early and swivel-pulls this in the gap and over the backward square leg fielder. Just cleared the leaping fielder
flat on off, blocked by Yamin off the front foot
short and wide to begin with, Malik tries to cut fiercely but badly times the ball to point
fuller now outside off, pushed to the left of mid-off for a quick single
good batting from Malik, keeping the strike rotating. Fuller length on off, Malik plays the ball by his feet and runs a quick single as the ball trickles towards point
good length but straying on Yamin's pads who flicks the ball to deep square leg
drifts down leg and Malik misses his flick, called wide
crashed to deep cover with a splendid drive but the sweeper cover gets across and keeps the ball in, returns a swift throw but Malik is quick. They scamper back for the second
good length on middle and Malik neatly deflects the ball off his pads towards square leg to keep strike
overpitched outside off, driven with nice hands into the gap through cover
flatter outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot
flatter again and drifts on with the arm, Yamin goes back and tries to cut but is beaten. There is an appeal but not given. Didn't look like any contact
flighted on off, driven back to the bowler
lapse in concentration there. Too full and Yamin looks to clear the long-off fielder. Luckily for him, he doesn't time it at all and the ball goes to long-off on the bounce
flat and short on off, Malik cuts to cover
Yamin dances down the track but Chigumbura pulls his length back, Yamin can only push the ball to cover
slower delivery well outside off, Yamin mis-times his pull to midwicket
fullish length on off, Yamin tucks the ball to square leg and immediately calls for two but the experienced Malik refuses the non-existent second
slower delivery but way down leg side in spite of Malik's shuffle
fuller length on a fifth-stump line, Malik pats the ball with soft hands towards point and calls for one

and there is the wicket. Strangled down leg. What a way to go. Chigumbura does the trick. Not a great ball, short and on leg, Yamin looks to pull but is late on the ball and it kisses the glove and Mutumbami and Chigumbura are ecstatic. Disastrous way to go but end of a fighting, determined innings by Yamin
very full outside off, Riaz pushes the ball to cover for one
short and wide outside off, Wahab eases the ball down to third man off the front foot
tight lines. Fullish on a fifth-stump line, Malik plays the ball towards the keeper for one
wider and full, Wahab tries to find a single to third man but finds point instead.
and another dot ball. Full on off and Wahab deflects the ball straight to point again
oh, almost inside-edges onto his stumps. Good length delivery nipping back into Wahab who somehow gets bat down on the ball very late and the inside edge goes to short fine leg
excellent over, speared int the blockhole outside off, Malik squeezes the ball to short third man for a quick single
overpitched on off, hustles Malik for pace a touch who drives the ball to cover and refuses the single. Would have been a tight run anyway
short and wide, in the gap but not to the boundary. The cut travels to the sweeper cover
another inside-edge, back to the keeper. A bit short outside off and Wahab looks to cut
good pressure from Chigs. Good length on off, Wahab is looking for the single but can only pat the ball back to the bowler

what an effort from Chigumbura. Wahab is walking off. Splendid effort. He makes a run-out of nothing. Wahab's struggle continues as he can only inside-edge a ball back onto his shoe, but he is looking for a single as the ball trickles into the off side. However, Elton is quick on it, and under-arms a throw back onto the stumps as Riaz is sent back - all in one swift motion. Pak are 8 down and EC has his second wicket.
overpitched now on middle, Yasir nudges the ball into the gap at backward square. They scamper back for three
what a shot to start after the rain break. Terrific timing. Good length on middle and leg, Yasir gets on his toes and clips the ball superbly in the gap behind square for four
interesting shot. Back of a length outside off and Yasir leaves
nicely played once again. Short and wide, cut away nicely to the sweeper cover
overpitched on leg, Malik clips the ball to deep mdiwicket for one
fullish length with some nip in to Yasir who pushes the ball with the angle to long-on

finds the boundary again does Malik. Absolutely terrific match awareness and execution. Low full toss on middle and even though it is the last ball of the over, he swings the ball uppishly into the gap at midwicket for four. Splendid batting
pushed wider outside off, Yasir past the ball to point for one
overpitched on off, Malik chips the ball on the bounce to long-off
full and wide outside off, Yasir chops the ball to point as Elton stumbles over in his follow-through
well bowled, fired in quick on leg, Malik drills the ball to long-on
what a shot. Yasir has no problem sighting the ball. Low full toss outside off, Yasir launches this over cover, great placement.
nicely played again, good length outside off, Yasir stylishly gets on his toes, lifts one leg off the ground and pulls to midwicket
nice batting. Fullish length outside off, Yasir gets bat on ball and pushes the ball to point for one
lucky for Malik. Goes for the heave over long-off but skews the ball over point. High in the air and agonisingly wide of point. They race back for three
inside-edges the full and wide delivery back to the keeper. Mutumbami makes an excellent diving stop
that will be another boundary. Too full and wide. Yasir opens the face of the blade and just guides the ball over short third man for four more.
low full toss on leg now and Yasir calmly flicks the ball to fine leg for a single
speared in full and quick on middle, Malik drives to long-on for a single.

unbelievable stuff from Malik. He is in the zone right now, although he gets a gift from the bowler. Short and wide, Malik knows where his gap is and executes perfectly, smashes the ball over point for four
full on leg, clipped to deep square leg for one
short and wide again, cut away to third man for a single

this is getting better and better from Malik.  real masterclass of batting under pressure. Full on off and middle, and Malik opens the face of the bat and hits the ball over the infield to the cover boundary
good length now on middle, worked away into the leg side. Malik is looking for two but Raza is quick on it, keeps them down to one
high quality shot from Yasir now. Just times a drive past cover for two. Great timing, and the pair get another two.
excellent delivery. Yorker on off, dug out to point
excellent yorker once again. Splendid stuff. Yasir can only defend back to the bowler
lovely bowling this by Panyangara. Very full and very wide. Yasir comes down to throw that yorker length off but he misses
good variation but called wide. Too short maybe. Dug in on off, Yasir gets under it
good delivery again, looking for the yorker. But Yasir converts it into a low full toss and flicks to deep midwicket. Malik runs the first very quickly and comes back for the second
very full again outside off, Yasir drives to cover and goes through for the single. A direct hit would have been out
another beauty. Malik, take a bow. He gives himself room and carves the ball over point. Amazingly done. Anticipated the length and executed to perfection.
too full on off, Yasir creams another one on the bounce to long-off
low full toss on middle, Malik whips the ball to deep square leg and is looking for two but cannot get it
swiped away in the air, lands just short of the incoming deep midwicket fielder. He returns a wayward throw and they get an overthrow
excellent full delivery, Yasir just about gets bat on it and squirts the ball to short fine leg for one
good shot and excellent running by Yasir. Overpitched on middle and off, Malik uppishly drives the ball to long-on who makes a diving stop and returns a good throw but Yasir races back for the second
full toss on middle and Malik chooses to whip the ball to deep square leg for just the one
